name: commandlinedeliveryapplications
description: A simple CLI application that calculates the delivery time and cost of a fictional logistics company.

scripts.verify-cost-calculation: node main.js start 100 3 PKG1 5 5 OFR001 PKG2 15 5 OFR002 PKG3 10 100 OFR003
scripts.verify-cost-and-time-calculation: node main.js start 100 5 PKG1 50 30 OFR001 PKG2 75 125 OFR008 PKG3 175 100 OFR003 PKG4 110 60 OFR002 PKG5 155 95 NA 2 70 200
scripts.verify-double-offer-codes-both-invalid: node main.js start 100 3 PKG1 5 5 OFR001 OFR001 PKG2 15 5 OFR002 OFR001 PKG3 10 100 OFR001 OFR001
scripts.verify-double-offer-codes-mixed-validity: node main.js start 100 3 PKG1 5 5 OFR001 PKG2 15 5 OFR002 PKG3 10 100 OFR003 OFR001
scripts.verify-no-offer-code: node main.js start 100 3 PKG1 5 5 PKG2 15 5 PKG3 10 100
scripts.verify-failed-test: node main.js start 100 5 PKG1 50 100 OFR002 PKG2 50 100 OFR001 PKG3 150 100 OFR003 PKG4 99 100 OFR001 PKG5 100 100 OFR001 1 70 200

author: Kean Neng
